# Workspace setup

Open this folder in Cursor/VS Code and **Install All** when prompted for recommended extensions.

## Extension tiers

| Tier | Extensions | Purpose |
|------|------------|--------|
| **Must-have** | Flutter, Dart, Flutter Widget Snippets | Flutter commands, language server, hot reload, widget boilerplate |
| **Production** | Error Lens, Dart Data Class Generator, REST Client, GitLens | Inline errors, fromJson/toJson/copyWith, API testing, blame/history |
| **UI / clean code** | Material Icon Theme, Prettier, Bracket Pair Colorizer 2 | Icons, formatting, bracket matching |
| **Optional** | TODO Highlight, Path Intellisense, Code Spell Checker | Tech debt, imports, spell check |

## Do not install

- Random Flutter UI generators
- Deprecated state-management plugins
- Heavy AI auto-complete that rewrites widgets blindly

## Browser extensions (Chrome/Edge)

- **Flutter DevTools**
- **JSON Formatter**

## Ready-for-production checklist

- [ ] Flutter + Dart
- [ ] Error Lens
- [ ] GitLens
- [ ] REST Client
- [ ] Dart Data Class Generator
